metadata.Title: CVE-2022-46872 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
An attacker who compromised a content process could have partially escapedthe sandbox to read arbitrary files via clipboard-related IPCmessages.
*This bug only affects Thunderbird for Linux. Other operatingsystems are unaffected.*. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 108, FirefoxESR < 102.6, and Thunderbird < 102.6.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
